duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in the daily activities of the warehouse, including truck unloading, putting away, storing, picking, truck loading, and stock counting in a safe manner.
Work in the warehousing, order picking, palletizing, loading and unloading delivery trucks, and adhere to all safety and quality checks and specified rules.
Assemble and load products on delivery trucks accurately and in a timely manner, and load product pallets following standard operating procedures in accordance with the daily delivery schedule.

education_certification.credential: Relevant licenses to operate equipment and ability to lift a minimum of 50 lbs./25kg
